column4: and Werner will have to switch off the transceiver or else pretend that he hears only static.|All the Light We Cannot See|Anthony Doerr

column1: 02:12|Then the lights went out all over the city. It happened at 2.12 am according to power-house records
column2: but Blake's diary gives no indication of the time. The entry is merely
column3: 'Lights out - God help me.'|The Haunter of the Dark|H.P. Lovecraft
